title: Not FanArt but FanEats: Ziggs' Dirty Bomb Cake (plus recipe)

embed.description: "Cashing in on the dork in Smorgesdork with some @leagueoflegends baking. This is Ziggs' Dirty Bomb Cake. Ingredients: 2 Tsp Cinnamon/Cocao 1.5 Tsp Baking..."

body: Testing out recipes and designs for desserts, dinners, and apps for LCS Worlds this Fall, and decided to actually share my experiments. Much like the Hexslposive Expert Ziggs, I too like an explosion or too, but I prefer flavor explosions. 10 out of 10 would do this again, and I hope you try out my recipe. ^^

This is awesome and you are awesome!  **Moar League themed food!**
I too hope to have quite the spread of League foods for Worlds watching myself.

(I recently made Ziggs cake pops only somewhat successfully.  Word to the wise - don't think that bigger is automatically bigger, and try to make cake pops as large as a tangerine - they become too unstable to easily coat in chocolate.  It was a delicious, delicious, mistake!)

Thanks! I definitely do plan to make a lot more League Theme Food. It's an oddly large amount of dessert, but nothing wrong with that! Freljord Fried Chicken might be the next dish if I can find some Avarosan game hens. I'll share all my recipes if you want some foodspiration for your World watching spread.

That sounds like the best mistake you can make, a chocolate mistake. :D

Not to blow my own trumpet, but as one League themed cook to another - what did you think of the Tahm Kench recipes?
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/u78pishu-the-tahm-kench-cookbook

Full Disclosure, my friend and fellow summoner Kittifer sent me those recipes and said that I had some competition in craft food creation. It was at that moment that I rose from my keyboard and grabbed my trusty apron, and queued up for cuisine. 

The Amumoodles were the first thing I tried out, and it was as delicious as the flavor text for the dish was disconcerting. The Guts of the Krugettes made me squirm a little, but that made it so much more fun. Absolutely love the work put into each delicacy in art, writing, and flavor. 

I was kind of sad that I didn't find anymore League themed food items other than poro-snax online (which most people make them like a cinnamon roll, but we both know Poros are carnivores), so I'm hoping to add more depth and detail there as the "Smorgesork" :P

I love me some themed desserts. Have you considered making the icing red or using a red velvet cake recipe instead? His standard bombs just have so much red, I think they might be more iconic if you tied in the red coloring.
Regardless, chocolate bombs=delicious.

Absolutely considered it, but I was out of food coloring otherwise I would have made white and red frosting so I could paint it like one of his bombs. I didn't want to do red velvet cake because I like making mix from scratch, and making a cinna-cocao cake base was awesome! I'll be redoing this recipe come worlds, and I have other recipes to test and try. :)
